skillTree.localised_description: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.
Hurtling across the realms like incandescent meteors, Burning Chariots bring Tzeentch's emissaries to the foe.
With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Tzeentch’s gifts are yours to command!

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -5 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Immorality is subjective.

effects.description:
Enemy vigour loss reduction: +1%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The Great Schemer brings ruin to all.

Enemy spell resistance: -2%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy spell resistance: -4%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy spell resistance: -6%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Just as planned.
Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +1 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +3 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +5 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Blessed with the transformative boons of Tzeeneth, this one can travel further by his feathered wings, whether they be figurative or literal.
This one has become the conduit through which the Great Conspirator weaves His sorcerous webs, affecting glorious Change through magical means.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one seeks to sow the seeds of confusion, dissent and dishonesty, for such are the insidious ways of the Changer.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy missile resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Are you the Gatekeeper?"
Magic is everywhere, endless waves.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to all spells
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Nothing can pass through.
Twisted magic never stops.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What are we? Your scholars claim we exist only to tempt you, yet in a very real way we are you.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Winds gather.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(all units in army)
